summary: A dramatization of the controversial trial concerning the right for Neo-Nazis to march in the predominately Jewish community of Skokie.
cast: Danny Kaye|John Rubinstein|Carl Reiner|Kim Hunter|Eli Wallach|Brian Dennehy|George Dzundza|Ed Flanders|Charles Levin|Stephen D. Newman|James Sutorius|Lee Strasberg|Marin Kanter|Robin Bartlett|David Hurst|Joseph Leon|Ruth Nelson|Robin Morse|Michele Shay|Douglas Alan-Mann|Jack Callahan|Dan Conway|Richard Cusak|Harry Elders|Beatrice Fredman|Robert J. Jones Jr.|Pamela Keith|Dan Le Monnier|Marie Mathay|Bob McCord|Ward Ohrman|Jack Orend|Chelcie Ross|Ned Schmidtke|Taylor Williams|Patti Wilkus|Nancy Cartwright|Robert Minkoff
title: Skokie
